title: Online Information Evaluation and Utilization Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic internet research skills and foundational knowledge across academic disciplines
context.additional_context: Program for graduate students in mathematics focusing on evaluating the credibility of online information and its academic application

learning_goals: Learners can systematically search for online information required for academic or practical purposes.
Learners can evaluate the credibility of information sources based on a three-tier criteria: author, data, and publisher.
Learners can critically analyze high-quality information for mathematical problem-solving and construct logical connections.

resources: Mathematics Domain Reliability Assessment Case Database

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
